hotels.title: Family-Friendly Alice Springs Outback Oasis near Lasseters
hotels.description: An outback oasis in the heart of Australia’s vast Red Centre, Crowne Plaza Alice Springs Lasserters, an IHG Hotel, offers family-friendly convenience under the shadow of the mighty MacDonnell Ranges. With an unrivalled location - adjacent to the Alice Springs Convention Centre and entertainment hub Lasseters and only minutes from the CBD and airport - the region's countless treasures are within easy reach, elevated by stunning mountain views. Swim your way through Tjoritja West MacDonnell National Park's many permanent waterholes, wander through Alice Springs' world-class Indigenous museums and galleries or admire the scenery by camel or hot air balloon. Between walkabouts in the great red beyond, sip cold ones by the water at Splash Poolside Café, rebalance and revitalise with a visit to onsite spa Lavish or savour mouthwatering wagyu at Juicy Rump.

hotels.title: Alice Springs Red Centre Resort with Onsite Restaurant & Pool
hotels.description: Experience the charm of Australia's Red Centre with a stay at this serene property close to the town centre. Located on the banks of the Todd River, this oasis is a short stroll from the town's vibrant shopping, dining and entertainment precinct. Refurbished rooms offer all modern luxuries and a peaceful ambience to both business and leisure travellers. After a day exploring the MacDonnell Ranges or the historic Telegraph Station, retreat to the resort's Barra on Todd Restaurant and Bar for a taste of the Northern Territory's finest cuisine. For leisure, the resort offers a refreshing outdoor pool, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a tranquil garden area.
